game.title: Find the lost princess of the kingdom
game.objective: Find the lost princess of the kingdom.
game.description: The princess of the kingdom has gone missing and the king has hired your party to find her. She was last seen leaving the castle for a walk in the forest.
game.reward: 10,000 gold, a new weapon or armor, and the gratitude of the kingdom

task.objective: Talk to the king's advisor, Lord Harrington, for more information about the princess's disappearance.
task.description: Lord Harrington is the king's most trusted advisor and he may know more about the princess's disappearance than he's letting on.

task.objective: Search the forest for any clues of the princess's whereabouts.
task.description: The princess was last seen leaving the castle for a walk in the forest. Search the forest for any clues that may lead to her.

task.objective: If you find any clues, track them down until you find the princess.
task.description: If you find any clues leading to the princess's whereabouts, follow them until you find her.
task.location: Forest or cave or castle dungeon

task.objective: Once you find the princess, return her safely to the castle.
task.description: Once you find the princess, bring her back to the castle safely. The king and the kingdom will be overjoyed to see her.
